name: Winslow
text:
Winslow
Mrs. Winslow was a teacher at the Germantown Friends School.
On April 2, 1968, Winslow taught a sexual education class to the female students of the eighth grade class.
It was soon discovered that the class was spied on from the air vent by Dale Cooper. Along with the headmaster and Mr. Brumley, Mrs. Winslow confronted Cooper and confiscated the tape he had recorded of the class.
